casebody.data:
99-0656 (La. 4/23/99)

U. Wayne KERSHAW v. Clarence VIDRINE, Roger Richard, and Cameron Parish School Board. No. 99-C-0656. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Kershaw, U. Wayne; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Cameron 38th Judicial District Court Number 10-14412; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-1159

Denied.

VICTORY, J. not on panel.
